background_story:
As the youngest child of a wealthy Waterdhavian merchant, Devlen was never expected to amount to much. His parents and older siblings were content to let him while away his days with whatever idle pursuits he fancied, so long as he didn't cause too much of a disturbance. Devlen quickly learned that the easiest way to avoid potential conflict was to simply agree with whatever anyone said, no matter how outlandish or contradictory their statements might be. It was a habit that served him well throughout his childhood and adolescence, and one that he continues to this day.

While his siblings were busy learning the family business, Devlen took up magic. He showed a natural aptitude for it and, after much cajoling, his parents agreed to finance his studies at the wizard's academy in Waterdeep. It was there that Devlen met his future adventuring companions. They quickly bonded over their shared love of exploration and their shared disdain for authority figures.
